subject: No information of delivery of my Pro X Ultra Pedals
description_text:
Dear Ladies and Gentleman! 
 
 I haven't got any information about the delivery of my Pro X Ultra Pedals! I buyed them on 22th of November and I haven't got any information yet. 
 The RAM motors got already shipped. 
 
 Please can you tell me something about the delivery status of my Pedals 
 
 
 Order #SSN3729 
 Best wishes 
 Alois Reifinger

conversations.body_text: Hi david reifinger,      Unser deutsches Lager hat derzeit keine Grundplatten auf Lager. Wir haben Ihnen die Trittplatten zugeschickt und dafür gesorgt, dass die Grundplatten über einen alternativen Kanal versandt werden. Hier sind Ihre beiden Logistik-Tracking-Links:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326635171DE,JSELB0285287881YQ

Dear Ladies and Gentleman My Pedals and motors arrived but without a baseplate. And every shipping number you gave me got delivered. So please tell me where my Baseplate is or how long it will take that you ship it. Best regards David Reifinger -- Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 04.12.25, 13:25 schrieb "service@simsonn.com"

Hi david reifinger,    We apologize, but the base plate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped it to you separately. Here is your tracking link:  Expected delivery date: the 12th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELB0285287881YQ
I Ok, no problem at all, thank you for letting me know. I also wanted to tell you that the pedals feel great David -- Gesendet mit der GMX Mail App Am 08.12.25, 10:10 schrieb "service@simsonn.com"
Hi david reifinger,    Thanks for your feedback, and have fun!
